mjhv.shapes

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • mjhv.shapes.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Line, Rectangle, RegularPolygon

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    9/28/2016 This class is the superclass for all Shape objects
    Author:
    Mikaela Valenciano

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calcArea()
      This method calculates and returns the shape's area
      double calcPerimeter()
      Calculates and returns the perimeter of the shape
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
      This method sets the fill, stroke weight, and outline of the Shape
      boolean isPointInside(double x, double y)
      This method determines whether the point (x,y) is contained inside the shape-, returns true if point is on a shape edge or inside the shape and returns false if point is outside the shape

      This method moves the shape to the x and y coordinates that are passed in.

      This method scales the Shape by a double value
      void setFill(float r, float b, float g)
      This method sets the fill color of the shape with the RGB value that is passed in
      void setHeight(double h)
      This method sets the shape's height to a new height, that is passed in
      void setOutline(float r, float g, float b)
      This method sets the outline color of the shape with the RGB value that is passed in
      void setStroke(float weight)
      This method sets the stroke weight, in pixels, of the shape with the float value that is passed in
      void setWidth(double w)
      This method sets the shape's width to a new width, that is passed in

      • setFill

        public void setFill(float r,
                    float b,
                    float g)
        This method sets the fill color of the shape with the RGB value that is passed in
        Parameters:
        r - red value
        g - green value
        b - blue value

      • setOutline

        public void setOutline(float r,
                       float g,
                       float b)
        This method sets the outline color of the shape with the RGB value that is passed in
        Parameters:
        r - red value
        g - green value
        b - blue value

      • setStroke

        public void setStroke(float weight)
        This method sets the stroke weight, in pixels, of the shape with the float value that is passed in
        Parameters:
        weight - (or width) float value of the shape's lines in pixels

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(double w)
        This method sets the shape's width to a new width, that is passed in
        Parameters:
        w - double value for what the new width of the shape will be set to

      • setHeight

        public void setHeight(double h)
        This method sets the shape's height to a new height, that is passed in
        Parameters:
        h - double value for what the new height of the shape will be set to

      • move

        public void move(int xCoord,
                 int yCoord)
        This method moves the shape to the x and y coordinates that are passed in. These coordinates must be positive
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of new point
        y - y-coordinate of new point

      • calcPerimeter

        public double calcPerimeter()
        Calculates and returns the perimeter of the shape
        Returns:
        double value of the shape's perimeter

      • calcArea

        public double calcArea()
        This method calculates and returns the shape's area
        Returns:
        area of the shape

      • scale

        public void scale(double factor)
        This method scales the Shape by a double value
        Parameters:
        factor - double value of how much to scale the shape by

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        This method determines whether the point (x,y) is contained inside the shape-, returns true if point is on a shape edge or inside the shape and returns false if point is outside the shape
        Returns:
        true if the point is inside the shape or false if the point is outside of it

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        This method sets the fill, stroke weight, and outline of the Shape
        Parameters:
        marker - PApplet to be used in order to draw the rectangle

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
